title: Ep 229: Sticking in My Heaux Phase (Ft. Ryan)
itunes:title: Ep 229: Sticking in My Heaux Phase (Ft. Ryan)
description:
This week the ladies of WD are joined by a mutual friend and podcast, Ryan. They discuss hot girl/hot boy summer goals as Covid restrictions lift in New York. This week’s Vanilla Sh-t touches on education of masturbation and if it should be the parent’s or teachers’ responsibility to guide a child through puberty milestones. Ryan shares a sex tip for the fellas before they trio dive into the conversation on enjoying sex, time and company with multiple people while not wanting to “settle down”. How do you not lead the person on that you’ve been spending time with and being intimate? What boundaries should be set to protect everyone’s feelings…..if you even care to begin with. Let’s get into it


Follow this week’s guest on Instagram @flyry


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
